data.name: Mantis
data.description: A cosmic healer who can stun foes and redistribute health to an injured ally. Her abilities are stronger in Raids.

starItems.name: Mantis
starItems.description: A cosmic healer who can stun foes and redistribute health to an injured ally. Her abilities are stronger in Raids.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, then in addition, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> the target. Then lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
If Drax is an ally, +<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Drax

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, then in addition, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> the target. Then lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If Drax is an ally, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Drax.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, then in addition, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> the target. Then lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If Drax is an ally, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Drax.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
If Drax is an ally, +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Drax

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, then in addition, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> the target. Then lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If Drax is an ally, <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Drax.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, then in addition, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> the target. Then lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If Drax is an ally, <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Drax.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage primary target
If Drax is an ally, always apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Drax

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, then in addition, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> the target. Then lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If Drax is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Drax.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage. If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, then in addition, <color=#fff568>Stun</color> the target. Then lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

If Drax is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Drax.

1.description: Heal self and adjacent allies for <color=#86e619>1,500</color> Health  + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal additional allies for <color=#86e619>250</color> Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>250</color> Healing
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and adjacent allies

2.description: Heal self and adjacent allies for <color=#86e619>1,750</color> Health  + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all additional allies for <color=#86e619>500</color> Health. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and adjacent allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>250</color> Healing
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all allies

3.description:
Heal self and adjacent allies for <color=#86e619>2,000</color> Health  + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all additional allies for <color=#86e619>750</color> Health. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and adjacent allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all allies.

4.description:
Heal self and adjacent allies for <color=#86e619>2,250</color> Health  + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all additional allies for  <color=#86e619>1,000</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and adjacent allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>250</color> Healing
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and adjacent allies

5.description:
Heal self and adjacent allies for <color=#86e619>2,500</color> Health  + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all additional allies for  <color=#86e619>1,250</color> Health + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health. <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and adjacent allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all allies.

6.description:
Heal self and adjacent allies for <color=#86e619>2,750</color> Health  + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all additional allies for  <color=#86e619>1,500</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and adjacent allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>250</color> Healing
Always apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and adjacent allies

7.description:
Heal self and adjacent allies for <color=#86e619>3,000</color> Health  + <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health. Heal all additional allies for  <color=#86e619>1,750</color> Health + <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and adjacent allies.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, apply additional <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to all allies.

1.description:
Redistribute Health between self and lowest health ally evenly.

This ability cannot target summoned allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>500</color> Healing to self and lowest health ally
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, +<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from both self and that ally to primary target

2.description:
Redistribute Health between self and lowest health ally evenly + heal self and that ally for <color=#86e619>500</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from both self and that ally to primary target.

This ability cannot target summoned allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>500</color> Healing
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, +<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary target

3.description:
Redistribute Health between self and lowest health ally evenly + heal self and that ally for <color=#86e619>1,000</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from both self and that ally to primary target. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary target.

This ability cannot target summoned allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, +<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect

4.description:
Redistribute Health between self and lowest health ally evenly + heal self and that ally for <color=#86e619>1,000</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from both self and that ally to primary target. <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary target.

This ability cannot target summoned allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>500</color> Healing
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, transfer <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

5.description:
Redistribute Health between self and lowest health ally evenly + heal self and that ally for <color=#86e619>1,500</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to transfer <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from both self and that ally to primary target. <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target.

This ability cannot target summoned allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, always transfer <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, always clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

6.description:
Redistribute Health between self and lowest health ally evenly + heal self and that ally for <color=#86e619>1,500</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from both self and that ally to primary target. Clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target.

This ability cannot target summoned allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>500</color> Healing
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

7.description:
Redistribute Health between self and lowest health ally evenly + heal self and that ally for <color=#86e619>2,000</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, Transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from both self and that ally to primary target. Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target.

This ability cannot target summoned allies.

1.description:
On Spawn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

2.description:
On Spawn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health per <color=#fff568>GUARDIAN</color> ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health

3.description:
On Spawn, <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health per <color=#fff568>GUARDIAN</color> ally.
3.nextUpgrade: On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health

4.description:
On Spawn, <color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health per <color=#fff568>GUARDIAN</color> ally.

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Max Health per <color=#fff568>GUARDIAN</color> ally.
